title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
hello this macbook had a short cap c7564 on ppbus_g3h, then I already resolved it, but macbook still does not turn on.there are measures


PP3V42_G3H_REG=3.48
SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC=3.47
PPBUS_G3H=12.17v at 12.5 CHANGE OF VALUE

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
So PPBUS cycles between 12.17-12.5V?
What about SMC_RESET_L, is steady high?

Check voltage and diode mode at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
NOT cycles, in each measure it changes my value, for example 1 measure= 12.3 other measure 12.4 other measure 12.3 now value was 12.9. Sometimes not green light charger, sometimes turn on fan
SMC_RESET_L=3.3V

diode modeSCL PIN 4  J6950=0.546.     voltage=3.4
diode mode SDA PIN 6  J6950=0.543.    voltage=3.4

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
Did you measure PPBUS_G3H without battery connected?
Should get steady voltage, 12.5V aprox.

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message: yes, without battery.PPBUS-G3H doesn't 12,5v. Now measures 12.9V constant

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message: Change your multimeter battery and test again.

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message: I already changed the battery and tried another multimeter with the same value 12.9v

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
Do you get steady green light now?

What about 3V3_S5/SUS?

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message: not green light in this moment  3V3_S5=3.3V

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
WHEN YOU REFER 3V3_S5/SUS IS PP3V3_S5_REG? OR PP3V3_SUS_FET?
iN THIS MOMENT NOT GREEN LIGHT
PP3V3_S5_REG=3.3V
PP3V3_S5_P3V3SUSFET=3.3
PP3V3_SUS_FET=0V

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
3V3_S5/SUS = 3v3_S5 and 3V3_SUS.

Please do not use capital letters, apart of signal names; is more dificil to read the post.

Post U7000 voltages; pins 1, 2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
Voltages look good and I saw correct PPBUS_G3H (12.6V).
Why did you say 12.9V before?

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
in fuse f7040 12.9  gives that value on both sides,  It must also be said that this value has measured 12.9 on other occasions 12.3 or 12.8 
pin 28 the track is burned

title: 820-3115 b green light no turn on
message:
Rebuild any broken/burnt trace.
Check R7020/21/22 and R7050/51/52 resistors and their traces.
